name: Klo's
description:
Klo's is a short puzzle game built for the Extra Credits Game Jam (Ferbruary-March 2019). It is in no means meant to be a finished product but is meant to be judged as a full game despite that fact. Please play the first time as the game is made and a second time with music if you feel like it. --Artie

Klo will not put itself in harm and Klo will not jump. A and D move left and right.

Good Luck to all the other people putting games in for this jam!

Download instructions:

Download the zip file then extract to desktop. it should give an exe. Install as any other game of this kind. Make sure it creates a desktop icon for easy access.
